author: Kassi Harris
comment: Loved the app when it would actually work. Now it refuses to let me even login. Continues saying I have no network connection, BUT I DO and literally every other app and website on my phone will work while it says this. And it won't even open if I use data. "No connection" message over and over and over and over.... VERY frustrating.

author: Ilijas Dzonlic
comment: For the Bank that listening their clients your app should be able to get closed without forcing it, also your clients should be able to use Android pay. Taking a picture and deposit of check is at best, pain in the neck. My question is what kind of update you are doing when app is getting worse?

author: Zeina Ismail
comment: I called Tangerine and was told to reinstall the app because it wasn't functioning properly. The customer service rep asked me what phone I have and confirmed that I should uninstall and reinstall. (I could only see my balances and not the actual transactions). I uninstalled the app.. turns out I can't reinstall it... the app is not compatible with my S8. For a Bank that prides itself for being digitally savvy... This is ridiculous.

author: Clark Holdham
comment: Switched to tangerine for a simple modern banking experience but I'm disappointed with their Android support. Not only is the Android app well behind the Apple experience, they don't support Android Pay which every other Canadian bank has supported for 6 months now.

author: Joshua Klassen
comment: Not sure how an online bank can have the worst app of them all. Promised Android pay 8 months ago and it's still not here. Horrible app, horrible features, and overall a horrible bank. Do not bank with tangerine.

author: James
comment: This app needs fingerprint authentication. It is a perfect use case for it. Also this app has a tendency to freeze during login requiring me to force close and try again. Lastly the design is not well thought out and very unintuitive and does not reveal info such as available balance without extra interaction. I also find it funny how they brag about an award they got 4 years ago. If you made it a native material design app maybe you would be bragging about getting that award for the last 4 years instead. Hire someone who knows native android development please!

author: Ronna Black
comment: Used to be able to use this app and it worked pretty well. Now it gives me an error message telling me that it can't connect, to check my internet connection and try again. Obviously my internet connection is just fine, because I'm leaving this review.

author: Parveen Sharma
comment: I never had any issue when it was ING owned. Tangerine APP developers didn't test the APP on all platforms and devices. Why should  they restrict the APP on certain devices only. I have Pixel phone, with no issue with any of the 106 Apps installed on it but Tangerine stops after entering password. There is no submit button. I was told by an email to reinstall, which I did 100 times already. I have only two accounts with Tangerine, I am closing them all. Even an employee of Tangerine suggested so.. wow.. instead of fixing the App and listening to the bad reviews about the App, I like the suggestions of simply close my accounts

author: Violet
comment: App was okay although function is fairly limited versus browser access.  Now inexplicably stopped working with authentication/connection error.  Appears to be a server-end issue.  No longer supports earlier than Android 4.4.x even though Simplii is still actively providing updates that work on Android 4.0.x.  No good excuses for these issues when other app developers know how to do a good job.  I'm not going to buy a new phone just because this app can't work.  No way to reach Customer Service other than by phone.  Still working on iOS on iPhone 4s but who knows for how long.

author: Joshua Wickens
comment: Terrible app. Could not even install or update for a month. Had to use the browser. Now that I can install it. It freezes at the terms and service page. Before I got a error code when  I tried to rate but I'm glad to be able to now. App is garbage.

author: Ken Chan
comment: Basic app that let's you see your accounts and move your money. Not much else. Android pay doesn't exist even though it's been coming soon forever. Fingerprint authentication doesn't exist when it does on other banking apps. Electronic deposit of cheques is a pain when the app constantly takes blurry photos and won't focus and you can't get it to focus manually. Thought it was my camera, but on other banking apps the photos for deposits are fine. It gets the job done and it may have been an award winning app 4 years ago. But there doesn't seem to have been any improvement since then while everyone else has been updating with new features.

author: The Winner
comment: Terrible. Just terrible. If you ever need help, prepare to take a day off because you will wait that long to speak to someone.

author: Mima Accettura
comment: Used to work well on my tablet and suddenly stopped working 2 says sgo.  Message is similar to some other folks who have complained about the same thing.  The app says im not connected to interenet when I am.  Tried removing and reinstalling to no avail.

author: John P.
comment: This app is getting worse and worse.  Latest update is so laggy and often  unresponsive.  Where is the fingerprint authentication?  Why isn't there an auto logout when the app is closed?  For an online/mobile bank, there should be support for Android Pay. Multiple in app feedbacks and emails are unanswered to Tangerine developer.

author: Chris Blasko
comment: The UX is straightforward enough. My issue is that each time it's opened it warns me my device is modified (it isn't, SafetyNet check passes). And where's the Android Pay support?

author: Ryan Barnes
comment: Honestly I suggest no one listen to the other reviews on here. This app is probably one of the more functional one in Canada. On too of that it's a bank with great fees. ($0) in most cases, I have only had a good experience with this app but this might be because I have a newer phone? Seems like the people saying they are having problems are illiterate.

author: Justin Porteus
comment: It works ok, a bit glitchy at times, but useable. I have some security concerns though - it lets me view my account balances without entering a PIN. Fine, can be convenient and isn't much of a concern, but it is supposed to prompt for a PIN whenever you do anything. I was able to pay bills and email money with no such prompt. It needs a PIN for me to move money between my own accounts, but I can email money to an external account without any security? Ridiculous.

author: Ekaterina Ryjkova
comment: It's absolutely inexcusable that Tangerine still doesn't have Android or Samsung pay. Considering switching banks if the feature doesn't come out in the following couple of months.

author: Pooya G
comment: I like the app overall but there's one thing that's very very annoying.  Pressing back button doesn't close the app, instead it opens a menu and closes the same menu it opens. Just doesn't make sense.

author: Tk Kane
comment: How can you have all your services down at the same time? You do remember your hole thing is about online banking, doesn't makes sense to me to shut down your services for maintenance all at the same time.

author: Fizz Ishen
comment: I thought my biggest complaint is that you can't exit the app anymore, you have to force close.  But I was wrong.  I was getting a "connect to the network" when my network was working perfectly fine for all other apps. Reinstalled with no resolution so I called. Apparently there's a known issue with Samsung devices. When did that happen? And why isn't that in the blurb or tell me it's not compatible when I  go to update.  So now i either have to "check in" with another bank or go to an ATM. Not great customer service.

This app needs a major fix! It crashes consistently! They allways come up with updates but nothing is getting fixed! Android Pay is still not an option! The app is very slow at accomplishing tasks! Please fix this app ASAP!!!!

author: Maxim Ivanov
comment: Absolutely horrible and disgusting app. It keeps saying that the phone has no connection to the internet while it is connected. There is no way to login into the account. Reinstall, clearing cache, reboot: nothing helps.

author: Mike Richardson
comment: Where's the fingerprint authentication? It's present on a iPad version of the app and it's great. Other than this huge annoyance the app is ok

1. no fingerprint login, 2. back button does the wrong thing at home screen, 3. no real-time notifications of spending activity, 4. orange ( + ) button is bad UI: add those  buttons directly at top of account screen, or at least select the correct account when I use it with an account already open (similar to swiping right on account list). 5. session timed out messages when trying to login after not using the app for some time.

author: Tammy Botham
comment: App was working fine until yesterday. Now unable to login, says I have lost my network connection. I uninstalled and reinstalled, no improvement.

author: Heike Berres
comment: It's not letting me in my account, just says I have no connection, but my connection works fine with everything other

author: Nicholas Casbarro
comment: Used to be ok. Now it won't let me log in at all. It says there is a network error all the time even though it worked on the same network in the old version.

author: P Essy
comment: It's very slow, even slower than using the browser. I give it two stars because the cheque deposit feature is nice.

author: Stefan Crawford
comment: Crashes when depositing cheques and other random times. I have submitted bug reports for over 6 months, still no fix and no spectre exploit mitigation for safety.

author: Jonathan Hole
comment: ING was better Updates to the app now cause my tablet to freeze and crash. Don't bother with tangerine take your money elsewhere where the bank actually cares

author: Christopher DeLongchamp
comment: Tangerine removes brick and mortar stores and replaces it with this garbage app. But that's it. Instead of waiting ten minutes in line to cash a cheque, you instead yell at their half baked cheque deposit system for ten minutes. The app recently got a facelift, but it goes from a dot-com-boom era interface to "there's this new thing called material design, let's play with it" design, and somehow still manages to feel dated and slow.  Who's surprised though, Tangerine is based on intangible banking, but because of it, loses grip on reality.

author: Nathan Loewen
comment: Used to work great, but I'm not longer able to deposit checks on my pixel 2 xl.
Not bad, pretty user friendly but I have to go into settings and "force stop" each time to get it to let me past the first log in page.

author: Lorne Sutherland
comment: App constantly craps out when trying to make deposit. It's getting worse as time goes on.

author: Becky McAvoy
comment: was working fine until about a week ago...now it won't let me sign in because I apparently have no connection

author: Priyank Upadhyaya
comment: It's obvious Tangerine doesn't care about it's clients on Android devices. This app is garbage.

author: Craig McPherson
comment: This app USED to be good, but now, like many other users complaining here, it won't logon and tells me I have no network connection. Come on guys, get your act together and fix this app.

author: Steve Davison
comment: Useless.. used to be great. You upgraded it and now totally useless!!!!!

author: jarodbriand
comment: Worked for a few months, now it is displaying no network connection. I have connection and all other apps work.
